description: Orange bulbine (Bulbine frutescens) is an amazing plant species! It produces clusters of brilliant orange flowers on top of elegant, thick succulent foliage. This fast-growing evergreen ground-cover is drought resistant and low-maintenance, making it perfect for home gardens. Orange bulbine is an ideal choice for an easy to maintain garden as it is tolerant to a wide range of soil and climate conditions and is great for filling dry patches in gardens and landscapes. It also makes an excellent choice for borders or edgings and can be used as a succulent potting mix filler. Plus, bees, butterflies and hummingbirds are attracted to this gorgeous plant! With its showy orange flowers, vibrant foliage and easy to maintain habit, orange bulbine is a must-have in any garden.
